content:
Sure! Here is a grocery list for the Caesar salad with seafood:

* Romaine lettuce
* Garlic
* Anchovy fillets (optional)
* Egg yolk
* Lemon juice
* Dijon mustard
* Worcestershire sauce
* Olive oil
* Parmesan cheese
* Salt and pepper
* Croutons (store-bought or homemade)
* Cooked and chilled seafood (such as shrimp, scallops, or lobster)

Note: If you prefer a vegetarian version of Caesar salad, you can omit the anchovy fillets from the dressing recipe and use a vegetarian Worcestershire sauce.
